RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 85. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REVOLVING CREDIT broke out at the start bumping VIVID DREAMS, established the front and showed the way in hand three then two wide, swung three wide into upper stretch, came under light hand urging at the three-sixteenths, received six to seven taps to the right shoulder with the crop tucked and drew clear, then was in hand through the finish sixteenth to the finish. PARIS STYLE (FR) chased four to five wide down the backstretch before briefly tucking three wide nearing the half mile pole, tucked to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four to five wide for home, proved no match for the top one while running on clear for the place honors. RAYYA VALENTINE chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, weakened. DUKE GIRLS chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch and tired. VIVID DREAMS got bumped at the start by REVOLVING CREDIT, who broke outwards, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Revolving Credit
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, in hand 3-2w, 3w uppr, light urging, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Vivid Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Duke Girls
ENTRY.OWNER: LaPenta Robert V Madaket Stables LLC and ERJ Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Paris Style (FR)
ENTRY.OWNER: Walking L Thoroughbreds LLC and Three Chimneys Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-5w pursuit, to 3p 1/2, 2p turn, 4-5w upper, no match, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Rayya Valentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, angled 6w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Joseph A. Gimma S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 85. Stakes Purse 125000. FOR FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $125 each which should accompany the nomi nation; $625 to pass the entry box and an additional $625 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental nomination payment of $625 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purs e to be divided 55% to the owner of the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race other than maiden, claiming or starter allowed 2 lbs.; all maidens allowed 4 lbs. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, September 9, 2023 with 14 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARA'S TIME went to the front, showed the way on the inside, responded well when asked outside the quarter-pole, drew off into the final furlong, remained clear while shortening stride into the final sixteenth and held under steady urging. CALDWELL LUVS GOLD brushed with a rival at the start then was taken in hand while crowded, was urged at the rear, went four then five wide on the turn, commenced a rally coming to the quarter-pole and finished with good energy while unable to reach the winner. MY MANE SQUEEZE chased the pace on the outside then four wide on the turn and tired. MY SHEA D LADY stalked the pace on the outside, was given her cue in the three path on the turn, chases the winner into the stretch and weakened. NICKY JOLENE settled just off the pace, dropped back with five furlongs to run, fell to the rear while three then two wide on the turn and faltered then was eased but walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Cara's Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,showed way,ins turn,ask outside1/4,drew off,held driving

ENTRY.NAME: My Shea D Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside,asked 3path turn,chased,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Caldwell Luvs Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed brk,crowded,at rear,4-5w turn,gained,willingly for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Nicky Jolene
ENTRY.OWNER: John Grossi's Racing Corp and Falcone Jr Robert N
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace,dropped back 5/8,3-2path turn,faltered,eased,wlkd

ENTRY.NAME: My Mane Squeeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased outside,4wide turn,tired,held show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 76. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Pre ferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NOLITA bobbled at the start, showed the way in hand three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in under threat and gamely inched away at the end to prevail. NORTH END LADY broke out at the start, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, offered up a bid a furlong out getting on near even terms for command, dug in fighting on to the finish but was ultimately shaken off in the late going. FOXY CARA broke out at the start, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung five wide for home and weakened. SHE'S A NATURAL broke out at the start bumping SAINTE CHAPELLE, chased four then two wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. SAINTE CHAPELLE got bumped at the start by the aforementioned foe breaking outwards, raced five paths off the inside in closest aim of the leader down the backstretch, tucked three wide into the turn and came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide in retreat, then folded in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: North End Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 2p, ins turn, ins 1/4, bid 1/8, fought on

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Natural
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 4-2w, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Sainte Chapelle
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, 5w backstretch, 3w turn, 5w upper, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Nolita
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, in hand 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, dug in, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Foxy Cara
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 6-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 85000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% After care Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUSTIN BAY pressed the pace on the outside, took the lead while four then three wide on the turn, moved clear near the five-sixteenths pole, responded well under a drive in the stretch and held under steady urging. APRIL ANTICS moved out while urged along early, raced just off the pace, chased five then four wide on the turn, pursued the winner in the stretch and was second best. TEMPERMENTAL brushed with a rival at the start, settled on the outside, angled in late on the backstretch, moved from three to five wide on the turn and lacked the needed response while best of the rest. OK HONEY was hustled from the start, moved up under urging outside the five-eighths then advanced to make a bid along the rail, dropped back while saving ground on the turn and tired. FREDDYMO FACTOR was hustled from the gate, raced just off the pace, moved up to make a bid near the five-eighths, dropped back two then three wide on the turn, spun four wide into the stretch, moved out near the furlong marker and failed to respond. DUFRESNE brushed with a rival at the start, showed speed then contested the pace, dropped back in the three path on the turn and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Ok Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,urged along,mvd up5-1/2,bid,drop back rail turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: April Antics
ENTRY.OWNER: Krakow Racing LLC SOK Racing and Politano James
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved out,urged along,just off pace,chsd 5-4p turn,clear2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Freddymo Factor
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,just off pace,bid5/8,drop back 2-3path turn,4p1/4,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Dufresne
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed start,speed,pace,3path turn,faded

ENTRY.NAME: Tempermental
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed brk,settled outside,mvd in 1/2,3-5w turn,best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Bustin Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside,lead outside3/8,4-3p turn,clear5/16,held driving

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Robert D. Rosenthal & Peter Rosenthal & Martin Greenberg

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 80000. OUTER TURF FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAJESTIC RETURN broke open the gate prior to the start just after a pair of rivals directly to his inside broke through their stall doors, got coaxed at the start and showed the way in hand just off the inside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and cornered four then three wide into upper stretch, drew off under a drive to prevail. SOLIB coaxed from the start, chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while running on to secure the place honors. WEEKEND RAGS broke out at the start bumping SANDY'S GARDEN, chased along the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and kept on to secure the show honors. SIKUM broke open the gate and then went on through soon after CARBON broke through the gate to the outside prior to the start and weas reloaded, chased four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to the finish. CARBON broke through the gate prior to the start inspiring SIKUM to do so just after and MAJESTIC RETURN to knock open her stall door before being reloaded, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals. ROBYN AND ELI three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered no rally. SANDY'S GARDEN broke a half a beat slow and was bumped at the start by WEEKEND RAGS breaking outwards, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide for home, weakened in the late stages. MONROE coaxed from the start, chased along the inside and then just off the inside under coaxing from three furlongs out, spun three wide into upper stretch and offered no response. JACKSON AVENUE four wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Weekend Rags
ENTRY.OWNER: NY Final Furlong Racing Stable and WLIR Racing Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 5/16, 4w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Sandy's Garden
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 slw, bumped st, chased 5-4w, 5w upper, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Solib
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, no match, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Monroe
ENTRY.OWNER: Harrell Ventures LLC and Seaside Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, 3w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Jackson Avenue
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, coaxed 7/16, angled 5w upper, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Robyn and Eli
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Sikum
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Carbon
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Majestic Return
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 4-3w upper, drew off

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Marshall Gramm, Raymond Sauer & Mike Pietrangelo

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $32,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% A ftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILLFUL DESIRE bumped with a rival at the start, pressed the pace on the outside, vied in the five path on the turn, took the lead near the five-sixteenths, shook clear in upper stretch and drew away under steady urging. VAX bobbled at the start, was urged along off the pace, saved ground on the turn and narrowly earned the place. DANSEUR D'ORO was hustled from the gate, moved up to press the pace on the outside of the leader, vied in the four path on the turn and proved no match for the winner then just lost the place while clear for the show. SHASI was urged towards the rear, went two to three wide on the turn and failed to rally. LUNA LOCA was hustled from the gate, raced at the rear, moved from the rail to the two path on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. DREAMAWAYSEVEN charged the front of the gate at the start, showed the way under pressure to her outside, vied in the three path on the turn, lost the lead near the five-sixteenths and tired. PERFECT SENORITA bumped with a rival at the start, angled out early then was urged along on the outside, went six wide on the turn, spun seven wide into the stretch, suffered a catastrophic injury to her left foreleg at the three-sixteenths and fell then was euthanized on the course.

ENTRY.NAME: Luna Loca
ENTRY.OWNER: Arenas Marcelo and God's Glory Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,at rear,ins-2p turn,swung 5w1/4,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Shasi
ENTRY.OWNER: Siegel Sez Stables and Shaw Ken
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, 2-3path turn, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Vax
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled brk,urged along,inside turn,up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Danseur d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,moved out,4path turn,no match,missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Senorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,angled out,6w turn,7w1/4,injured3/16,fell

ENTRY.NAME: Willful Desire
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,press outside,5p turn,lead5/16,5p turn,drew away

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamawayseven
ENTRY.COMMENT: charged gate,pace,3path turn,tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 92. Allowance Purse 80000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non- winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BANK FRENZY broke out at the start and was corrected, came under brief coaxing and took command showing the way three then two wide through the first turn, settled in hand three then two wide down the backstretch and into the far turn, came under light coaxing near the quarter pole, floated out five wide into upper stretch, drifted out drawing clear under a drive despite a right handed crop, then shied out three paths in the final steps to the wire and was corrected while well clear for the victory. BOYS CODE got bumped at the start by AMEDEUS MUSIC due to pressure from HERE'S WALDO, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing half a mile from home, went seven wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while running on willingly to secure the place honors. UNCLE MARTY chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the far turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, kept on to secure the show honors. AMEDEUS MUSIC got bumped at the start by HERE'S WALDO and in turn bumped BOYS CODE, chased three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. JACKSON HEIGHTS coaxed from the gate, raced just off the inside through the first turn before chasing five wide down the backstretch and through the far turn under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, went six wide into upper stretch, passed tired rivals. ACH DU LIEBER broke out at the start, chased three to four wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, went seven to eight wide into upper stretch and tired. SUPREME BEING broke out at the start, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch and tired. HERE'S WALDO broke in at the start bumping AMEDEUS MUSIC into BOYS CODE, chased four wide under a ride from the seven-sixteenths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Boys Code
ENTRY.OWNER: Dixon Linda K and Alejandro Hector M
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 1/2, 7w uppr, no match, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Amedeus Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 3w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Here's Waldo
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 4w, coaxed 7/16, 3-4w upper, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Marty
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 3w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Supreme Being
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 7/16, 5-6w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Ach Du Lieber
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 7/16, 7-8w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Jackson Heights
ENTRY.OWNER: Zilla Racing Stables Black Jack Racing LLC and Acqua Nova Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 5w, coaxed 7/16, 6w upper, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Bank Frenzy
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, in hand 3-2w, 5w uppr, drew clear, drifted, shied lte

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Bertram F. Bongard S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 88. Stakes Purse 125000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $125 each which should accompany the nomination; $625 to pass the entry box and an additional $625 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental nomination payment of $625 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the owner of the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race other than maiden, claiming or starter allowed 2 lbs.; all maidens allowed 4 lbs. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, September 9th, 2023 with 15 nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EL GRANDE O bumped lightly with a rival at the start, set the pace under pressure to his outside, vied in the two path on the turn, moved clear at the five-sixteenths pole, drew off into the final furlong and proved best under steady urging. AGGELOS THE GREAT moved out while urged along early then chased the pace, went three wide on the turn, was driven five wide into the stretch and safely secured the place. BONNE CHANCE was urged along on the outside, went four to five wide on the turn and lacked the needed response while best of the rest. SKYLER'S STARSHIP made light contact with a foe at the start, was urged along off the pace, dropped back late on the backstretch, went three then two wide on the turn and was no factor. DETECTIVE TOM pressed the pace on the outside, vied in the four path on the turn, dropped back at the five-sixteenths pole and came up empty. RANGER BLUE moved out while urged along off the pace, dropped back late on the backstretch, went four wide on the turn and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Ranger Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved out,urged along,drop back 7/16,4w turn,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Aggelos the Great
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd out,chased,3path turn,5path1/4,second best

ENTRY.NAME: El Grande O
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump brk,set pressured pace,2p,clr5/16,4p1/4,drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Skyler's Starship
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump brk,urged along,drop back 1/2,3-2path turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Detective Tom
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside,vied 4path turn,drop back 5/16,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Bonne Chance
ENTRY.OWNER: Flying P Stable and Levine Bruce N
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along outside,4-5path turn,best of rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 106. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 102000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $17,748 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 1 22 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim W ill Be Void). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPUN AND WON four wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and was just up to prevail in the final jump to the finish. LEGENDS CAN'T DIE coaxed from the gate, showed the way from the two path under pressure from MY HARBORS DREAM to the outside, swung five wide into upper stretch, shook off his main pace rival, dug in and under threat to the outside and was nailed on the wire. MY HARBORS DREAM pressed the pace from the outside in the three path coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went six wide into upper stretch, got shaken off straightened away and kept on to preserve the show honors. H P MOON chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. EMERALD FOREST chased four to five wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, stayed on one paced to the finish. LUCKY CURLIN struck the near side stall at the start getting away last, chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn, went seven to eight wide into upper stretch and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Legends Can't Die
ENTRY.OWNER: Reeves Thoroughbred Racing R A Hill Stable RAP Racing and Mara Chris
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, cut pressured pace 2p, 5w upper, dug in, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Curlin
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate st, 5w early, 2p turn, 7-8w upper, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: H P Moon
ENTRY.OWNER: KEM Stables and Five Hellions Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: My Harbors Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3w, coaxed 5/16, 6w upper, shaken off, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Emerald Forest
ENTRY.OWNER: Krakow Racing LLC and Five Horsemen Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-5w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Spun and Won
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 7w upper, dug in, just up
